entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who has short and bright pink hair. She is trying to help Harry by suggesting that she would attract less attention on the underground.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who has a vision of the attack on Mr. Weasley. He is not interested in discussing it with Tonks.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who was attacked by Harry's vision.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a person with Seer blood in her family.

relationships.description: Tonks is trying to help Harry by suggesting that she would attract less attention on the underground.
Tonks asks Harry if there is any Seer blood in his family.
Harry feels insulted by Professor Trelawney's suggestion that he has Seer blood in his family.
Tonks and Harry are discussing the nature of Harry's vision.
